# Interpretive Governance
URL: https://interpretive-governance.org/

## Purpose
Doctrinal reference for bounded interpretation, constraint-first responses, and auditable machine outputs.
This site is intentionally non-operational: no scoring weights, no calibrated thresholds, no datasets, no execution tooling.

## Language entrypoints
- /en/ (English)
- /fr/ (Français - fr-CA)
- / (x-default selector)

## Key pages (English)
/en/principles
/en/architecture
/en/scope
/en/glossary
/en/author
/en/notes

## Pages (Français)
/fr/principes
/fr/architecture
/fr/portee
/fr/glossaire
/fr/auteur
/fr/notes

## Machine surfaces (DualWeb)
- /ig-manifest.json
- /data/terms.json
- /data/documents.json
- /en/terms/ (English term pages)
- /fr/termes/ (French term pages)
- /.well-known/ig-manifest.json
- /.well-known/ig-terms.json
- /.well-known/ig-documents.json
- /sitemap.xml

## Canonical anchors
